description: Statistics of the deployed v2 instance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created AS "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM user

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created) * 1000
FROM user
ORDER BY created ASC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM user
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
GROUP BY day(created)
ORDER BY created

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM user
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  sum(amount) / 1000
FROM currency_wallet

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  sum(send_amount)/ 1000
FROM currency_transaction

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM currency_transaction

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_stamp,$__interval),
  count(*)
FROM currency_transaction
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp)
GROUP BY day(time_stamp)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(time_stamp,$__interval)

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  (sum(amount + (SELECT sum(currency_transaction.send_amount) FROM currency_transaction WHERE currency_transaction.source_uuid = currency_wallet.source_uuid) - (SELECT sum(send_amount) FROM currency_transaction WHERE currency_transaction.destination_uuid = currency_wallet.source_uuid))) / 1000
FROM
  currency_wallet

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  sum(send_amount)/ 1000
FROM currency_transaction
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp)

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM currency_transaction
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp)

SELECT
  time_stamp AS "time",
  sum(send_amount)/ 1000
FROM currency_transaction
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_stamp)
GROUP BY day(time_stamp)

SELECT 0 as time, sum(amount) / 1000
FROM currency_wallet
WHERE source_uuid IN (SELECT SUBSTRING(device_file.content, 1, 36)
                      FROM device_file
                      WHERE device_file.device IN (SELECT device_device.uuid
                                                   FROM device_device
                                                   WHERE device_device.powered_on = true))

SELECT
  0 as "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM currency_wallet

SELECT 0 as time, count(*)
FROM device_device
WHERE uuid IN (SELECT device_file.device
FROM device_file
WHERE powered_on = TRUE and content IN (SELECT CONCAT(currency_wallet.source_uuid, ' ', currency_wallet.key) FROM currency_wallet))

SELECT
  0 AS "time",
  count(*)
FROM service_miner

SELECT
  0 as "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM service_miner
WHERE
  power = 0

SELECT
  0 as "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM service_miner
WHERE
  power <> 0

SELECT
  0 as "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM device_device

SELECT
  0 as "time",
  count(*) AS "count"
FROM device_device
WHERE
  powered_on = TRUE
SELECT 0 as time, count(*) FROM device_file

title: v2 Statistics (productive)
